SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE type='menu' AND parentid=1 AND id IN (SELECT sys_permission_id FROM sys_role_permission WHERE sys_role_id IN (SELECT sys_role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE sys_user_id = #{userid}) )

SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE parentid=#{parentid} AND parentid!=1 AND id IN (SELECT sys_permission_id FROM sys_role_permission WHERE sys_role_id IN (SELECT sys_role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE sys_user_id = #{userid}) )

SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE type='permission' AND id IN (SELECT sys_permission_id FROM sys_role_permission WHERE sys_role_id IN (SELECT sys_role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE sys_user_id = #{userid}) )

SELECT a.id id, a.parentid pId, a.parentids parentids, a.name name, a.type type, a.url url, a.percode percode, a.sortstring sortstring, a.available available, a.creater creater, a.mender mender FROM sys_permission a LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON p.id = a.parentid ORDER BY a.sortstring
